caption.p: SEM images of the Y(OH) 3:7.5% Eu 3+ phosphors obtained at different synthesis times: (a) 5 min, (b) 15 min, and (c) 60 min. (d–f) Overview TEM and HAADF-STEM micrographs of the particles prepared at 60 min. The sample is composed of micrometer-sized multipods, which seem to be a controlled ensemble of ≈10 nm thick nanowires.
